name: Kitami and Palito Mikado Pendants Collection
description: KITAMI and PALITO MIKADO pendants collection Kitami venicem pendant lighting This elegant chandelier emits direct light from glazed glass diffusers mounted on top of metal rods assembled to form a system of parallel and perpendicular lines. The metal finish can be polished black nickel, polished gold, chrome or matte black chrome. The size: 70 cm / 27.55 "DX 95 cm / 37.4" H 83 cm / 32.57 "DX 95 cm / 37.4" V 120 cm / 47.24 "DX 150 cm / 60" V Materials: steel Light Source: Halogen / LED Palito mikado MIKADO, the fascinating disorder of intersecting lines, united in a sophisticated structure. Equipped with the latest LED and special lens technology, MIKADO evolves into a light object with a particular charm. Show more
